body:
Oh that must be a bug then. Because the guild literally has no posts or comments since its creation on August 29, 2020. The GM ([Urbanfrog](https://ruqqus.com/@Urbanfrog)) hasn't even made any posts in the last three months.

@kek @sfrohne you think this might be a bug with the siege algorithm? The [Siege page](https://ruqqus.com/help/siege) says a guild can be sieged if GM has no activity in a guild for at least 60 days.
body_html:
Oh that must be a bug then. Because the guild literally has no posts or comments since its creation on August 29, 2020. The GM (Urbanfrog) hasn't even made any posts in the last three months.

@kek @sfrohne you think this might be a bug with the siege algorithm? The Siege page says a guild can be sieged if GM has no activity in a guild for at least 60 days.

body:
[I think this comment is right](https://ruqqus.com/+RequestAGuild/post/61o4/help-to-siege-ruqqushelp/l1et). Urbanfrog's last comment was made "1 month ago" (which could be less than 60 days ago), and the [siege page](https://ruqqus.com/help/siege) says that the GM of the guild may not have made any comments within the last 60 days.

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
I think this comment is right. Urbanfrog's last comment was made "1 month ago" (which could be less than 60 days ago), and the siege page says that the GM of the guild may not have made any comments within the last 60 days.

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]
